original: @#/_/dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub
analyzed: @#/_/dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub
translated: The Accomplishment of Glorious Mahākāla🔽

original: bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub🔽thabs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
translated: The Means of Attaining the Powers of Glorious Mahakala for Protection and Repelling

original: @#/_dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub dang bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs
analyzed: @#/_dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub dang bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs
translated: The Means of Attaining the Powers of Glorious Mahakala for Protection and Repelling

original: zhes bya ba bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shri ma ha ka la sid+d+hi k+shar+ya gi
analyzed: zhes bya ba bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shri ma ha ka la sid+d+hi k+shar+ya gi
translated: In Sanskrit: Shri Mahakala Siddhi Kshariga Dharaja

original: ra dza d+ha na ma/_bod skad du/_dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub _bsrung ba
analyzed: ra dza d+ha na ma/_bod skad du/_dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub _bsrung ba
translated: In Tibetan: The Means of Attaining the Powers of Glorious Mahakala for Protection and Repelling

original: dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshhal lo//
analyzed: dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/_dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshhal lo//
translated: Homage to Glorious Mahakala!

original: dbang dang man ngag thob pa dang /_/bsnyen bsgrub sngon du song ba yis/_/
analyzed: dbang dang man ngag thob pa dang /_/bsnyen bsgrub sngon du song ba yis/_/
translated: One who has received empowerment and instructions, and has gone through the approach and accomplishment,

original: rang nyid nag po chen po dang /_/he ru ka dpal dbyer med bsgom/_/sum
analyzed: rang nyid nag po chen po dang /_/he ru ka dpal dbyer med bsgom/_/sum
translated: meditates on oneself as inseparable from Mahakala and glorious Heruka,

original: gril rgyan can bsnyen pa bya/_/mdun du thugs mgon 'khor bcas bskyed/_/
analyzed: gril rgyan can bsnyen pa bya/_/mdun du thugs mgon 'khor bcas bskyed/_/
translated: with the three-layered ornaments, and performs the approach. In front, one generates the mind-protector with retinue.

original: bsnyen pa tshhad la phyin pa dang /_/gzhan gyi rigs sngags bzlog par bya/_/rtshi
analyzed: bsnyen pa tshhad la phyin pa dang /_/gzhan gyi rigs sngags bzlog par bya/_/rtshi
translated: When one has reached the limit of the approach, one should repel the mantras of others.

original: dug gi shing la rnga mong bdun bya/_zan bshos dmar nag lnga/_khrag gi gtor
analyzed: dug gi shing la rnga mong bdun bya/_zan bshos dmar nag lnga/_khrag gi gtor
translated: For the poison tree, there are seven camels, five red and black ritual cakes, five blood torma,

original: ma lnga/_zan changs lnga/_ngar mi chen po lnga/_nam mkha' lnga/_gdugs lnga
analyzed: ma lnga/_zan changs lnga/_ngar mi chen po lnga/_nam mkha' lnga/_gdugs lnga
translated: five ritual cakes, five large raw hides, five pieces of sky, and five parasols

original: la dar nag rnams btags la rtshug_/bal sna lngas 'phan gdugs bya/_'phar ba/
analyzed: la dar nag rnams btags la rtshug_/bal sna lngas 'phan gdugs bya/_'phar ba/
translated: with black silk attached. Make banners and parasols from the five types of wool.

original: dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
translated: The Sādhana of the Protection and Repelling of the Attainments of Glorious Mahākāla🔽Make five groups of each of the following: wolf, dog, pig, lion, tiger, bear, bird, and sheep.

original: spyang khu/_khyi/_phag_/seng ge/_stag_/dom/_bya/_lug_/rnams lnga tshhan re re bya/_khyad par du bshos bu khru gang ba zur gsum pa dmar nag
analyzed: spyang khu/_khyi/_phag_/seng ge/_stag_/dom/_bya/_lug_/rnams lnga tshhan re re bya/_khyad par du bshos bu khru gang ba zur gsum pa dmar nag
translated: In particular, make a triangular ritual cake one cubit tall, red and black,

original: khrag gis brgyan pa cig bya/_bzlog pa'i 'khor lo bzhi bri/_bsad pa'i
analyzed: khrag gis brgyan pa cig bya/_bzlog pa'i 'khor lo bzhi bri/_bsad pa'i
translated: adorned with blood. Draw four reversing wheels,

original: 'khor lo brgyad bri/_gnan pa'i ling ga gsum bri/_de nas gtor ma zangs
analyzed: 'khor lo brgyad bri/_gnan pa'i ling ga gsum bri/_de nas gtor ma zangs
translated: draw eight killing wheels, and draw three suppression effigies.🔽Then, arrange the gtor ma in a copper vessel or the like,🔽face west, and place a green hoḥ in the south

original: zhong la sogs par bshams la/_rang kha nub tu blta/_lhor ho ljang /_byang
analyzed: zhong la sogs par bshams la/_rang kha nub tu blta/_lhor ho ljang /_byang
translated: and a red hoḥ in the north.

original: bu'i phreng bas bskor/_yi dam chos skyong gi thang sku dgram/_dmar gtor/🔽dkar gtor gnyis bshams/_bzlog pa'i 'khor lo ngar mi'i gnas gsum du
analyzed: bu'i phreng bas bskor/_yi dam chos skyong gi thang sku dgram/_dmar gtor/ dkar gtor gnyis bshams/_bzlog pa'i 'khor lo ngar mi'i gnas gsum du
translated: Surround the child with a garland of children, arrange the cloth paintings of the pledged deity and the Dharma protectors, and set out the red torma and the white torma.🔽Place the reversal wheel in the three places of the effigy,

original: sba/_gnan pa'i 'khor lo sha khyi'i thod par gzhugs/_bsad pa'i 'khor lo
analyzed: sba/_gnan pa'i 'khor lo sha khyi'i thod par gzhugs/_bsad pa'i 'khor lo
translated: place the suppression wheel in the skull of a dog that eats corpses, and burn the killing wheel in a fire pit.

original: ho la bsreg go/_/de ltar rdzas rnams la me rlung gi sbyor ba bya'o/_/bdag
analyzed: ho la bsreg go/_/de ltar rdzas rnams la me rlung gi sbyor ba bya'o/_/bdag
translated: Thus, apply the fire and wind yoga to the substances.

original: mgon por bskyed/_thugs khar he ru ka bsgom/_ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya/
analyzed: mgon por bskyed/_thugs khar he ru ka bsgom/_ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya/
translated: Generate yourself as the protector, meditate on Heruka in your heart, and summon and absorb the awareness beings.

original: mchod pa dang gtor ma 'bul/_rin po che sna tshhogs dang /_'bru sna tshhogs
analyzed: mchod pa dang gtor ma 'bul/_rin po che sna tshhogs dang /_'bru sna tshhogs
translated: Make offerings and offer tormas, various jewels, various grains,

original: dang /_sman sna chan dang bcas pa 'bul/_de nas bgegs la gtor ma sbyin/
analyzed: dang /_sman sna chan dang bcas pa 'bul/_de nas bgegs la gtor ma sbyin/
translated: and various medicines. Then, give a torma to the obstructors,

original: mtshhams gcad/_de nas stod pa'i rim pa thams cad bya/_thugs dam🔽bskang /_rkang pa brgyad pas bstod/_de nas gtor mdos de thugs mgon la
analyzed: mtshhams gcad/_de nas stod pa'i rim pa thams cad bya/_thugs dam bskang /_rkang pa brgyad pas bstod/_de nas gtor mdos de thugs mgon la
translated: and cut the boundary. Then, perform all the stages of the torma ritual,🔽fulfill the sacred commitments,🔽and praise with the eight-line praise. Then, generate the torma ritual as Protector with the four action protectors surrounding him,

original: las mgon bzhis bskor bar bskyed/_'khor nag po stong /_sha za 'bum/
analyzed: las mgon bzhis bskor bar bskyed/_'khor nag po stong /_sha za 'bum/
translated: with a retinue of a thousand black ones and a hundred thousand flesh eaters.

original: ma mo bye ba/_mkha' 'gro ma 'bum/_gnod sbyin khri/_'khor lha srin sde
analyzed: ma mo bye ba/_mkha' 'gro ma 'bum/_gnod sbyin khri/_'khor lha srin sde
translated: ten million mamos, one hundred thousand dakinis, ten thousand yakshas, and a retinue of the eight classes of gods and rakshasas.

original: brgyad dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/_mchod pa 'bul ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/
analyzed: brgyad dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/_mchod pa 'bul ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/
translated: Then invite them and make offerings and so forth.🔽Then, “the short a of proclaiming ha, the clockwise turning of the right wheel” and so forth, and recite the precious garland.

original: de nas ha sgrogs ma'i chung bsdud dal kha g.yas su sgyur zhes pa yan chad dang / rin chen dpungs pa 'don/_de nas sngags ni/_om ma ha ka la bzlog hum hum
analyzed: de nas ha sgrogs ma'i chung bsdud dal kha g.yas su sgyur zhes pa yan chad dang / rin chen dpungs pa 'don/_de nas sngags ni/_om ma ha ka la bzlog hum hum
translated: Then the mantras are: Oṃ mahākāla balikā hūṃ hūṃ

original: phat phat/_om badzra ma ha ka la ya bzlog hum hum phat phat/_om ma ha ka la gu na
analyzed: phat phat/_om badzra ma ha ka la ya bzlog hum hum phat phat/_om ma ha ka la gu na
translated: phaṭ phaṭ, oṃ vajra mahākālaya balikā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ, oṃ mahākāla guṇ

original: hri ta bzlog hu~m hu~m phat phat/_om ma ha ka la ga na pa ta bzlog hu~m hu~m phat phat/
analyzed: hri ta bzlog hu~m hu~m phat phat/_om ma ha ka la ga na pa ta bzlog hu~m hu~m phat phat/
translated: hrīta balikā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ, oṃ mahākāla gaṇapati balikā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ,

original: om ma ha ka la si ti yo du dza bzlog hu~m hu~m phat phat/_ha ha hum hum/_ki li ki li
analyzed: om ma ha ka la si ti yo du dza bzlog hu~m hu~m phat phat/_ha ha hum hum/_ki li ki li
translated: oṃ mahākāla siddhyodaya balikā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ, ha ha hūṃ hūṃ, kili kili

original: che ge mo bzlog b+h+yoh/_pho phe phat che ge mo bzlog b+h+yoh/_kre kre kre che ge mo/_tram k+sha
analyzed: che ge mo bzlog b+h+yoh/_pho phe phat che ge mo bzlog b+h+yoh/_kre kre kre che ge mo/_tram k+sha
translated: so-and-so balikā bhyoḥ, pho phe phaṭ so-and-so balikā bhyoḥ, tre tre tre so-and-so, tram kaṣ

analyzed: sham che ge mo/_ka ha ka ha che ge mo/_hre hre kre gnod byed bzlog b+h+yoh/_pa tsha pa

analyzed: tsha che ge mo/_hum hum phat phat che ge mo/_ha ha ha ha che ge mo/_ram ram b+ham che ge mo/

analyzed: kam kam kam che ge mo bzlog b+h+yoh/_rtsha rtsha rtsha che ge mo/_yam yam yam che ge mo/_sam sam sam

analyzed: che ge mo/_pho phe pho che ge mo/_b+ham b+ham lha che ge mo/_rgyu rgyu rgyu che ge mo/_g+ham g+ham

original: g+ham che ge mo/_klu klu kluche ge pam pam pam che ge dza dza dza zlog zlog blo b+ho rbad che ge mo🔽bzlog b+h+yoh/_thun re la sngags lnga lnga bskul zhing bzlog par bya'o/_/byang bu la ming
analyzed: g+ham che ge mo/_klu klu kluche ge pam pam pam che ge dza dza dza zlog zlog blo b+ho rbad che ge mo🔽bzlog b+h+yoh/_thun re la sngags lnga lnga bskul zhing bzlog par bya'o/_/byang bu la ming
translated: [Name of the spirit]🔽[

original: spel dang bcas pa bris la rtags par bya'o/_/byang bu ni mtshhon cha'i rnam par 'bri
analyzed: spel dang bcas pa bris la rtags par bya'o/_/byang bu ni mtshhon cha'i rnam par 'bri
translated: Draw the name of the enemy on a birchbark scroll with the addition of the mantra, and seal it.🔽The birchbark scroll is written in the form of weapons,

original: ba'am/_gzugs su byas te/_mda' dang /_mdung dang /_ral gri dang / dbyug tho dang /_rtshe gsum dang /_tho ba dang /_rdo rje rgya gram dang /_gri gug du
analyzed: ba'am/_gzugs su byas te/_mda' dang /_mdung dang /_ral gri dang / dbyug tho dang /_rtshe gsum dang /_tho ba dang /_rdo rje rgya gram dang /_gri gug du
translated: or made into an image, such as an arrow, spear, sword, club, trident, hammer, vajra cross, or curved knife.

original: bya'o/_/de bzhin du zhag gsum mam/_lnga'am/_bdun nam/_nyi shu rtsha gcig tu🔽bya'o/_/yang zhag gcig la yang nyan no/_/thod zor bca'o/_/de dmag dang bcas pas dgra phyogs su btang ngo /_/de nas ho bsreg go/_/ngar mi 'khor lo
analyzed: bya'o/_/de bzhin du zhag gsum mam/_lnga'am/_bdun nam/_nyi shu rtsha gcig tu bya'o/_/yang zhag gcig la yang nyan no/_/thod zor bca'o/_/de dmag dang bcas pas dgra phyogs su btang ngo /_/de nas ho bsreg go/_/ngar mi 'khor lo
translated: Similarly, it is done for three, five, seven, or twenty-one days.

original: dang bcas pa lam rgya gram du gnan/_gcig kho'i mgul du mnan/_sbyin sreg
analyzed: dang bcas pa lam rgya gram du gnan/_gcig kho'i mgul du mnan/_sbyin sreg
translated: It is also done for one day. The skull cup is prepared. Together with the army, it is sent in the direction of the enemy. Then it is burned in a fire pit. The wheel with the effigy and the retinue is pressed into the crossroads. One is pressed around the enemy's neck.🔽The burnt offering

original: thal ba zor du 'phang /_yang na gnan pa bya'o//_//
analyzed: thal ba zor du 'phang /_yang na gnan pa bya'o//_//
translated: ashes are thrown as a missile, or it is suppressed.

original: yang gtor ma bsdus pa byed na/_zangs gzhong la sogs pa'i nang du ri
analyzed: yang gtor ma bsdus pa byed na/_zangs gzhong la sogs pa'i nang du ri
translated: If one performs the concise bali offering, in a copper basin or the like, arrange the🔽three sweets.

original: rab bang rim gsum pa bya/_de'i steng du gtor ma zur gsum pa gcig bzhag/
analyzed: rab bang rim gsum pa bya/_de'i steng du gtor ma zur gsum pa gcig bzhag/
translated: On top of that, place a triangular torma.🔽On that, place a crow head with beak, and around that, place five

original: de la bya rog gi dbu mdzugs/_de la nam mkha' dang /_gzugs lnga lngas
analyzed: de la bya rog gi dbu mdzugs/_de la nam mkha' dang /_gzugs lnga lngas
translated: sky-wanderers and five forms.

original: dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
analyzed: dpal nag po chen po'i dngos grub bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
translated: The Sādhana Called “The Protection and Repelling of the Powers of Glorious Mahākāla”

original: bskor/_yang na brgyad kyis bskor/_bshos bu bzhis bskor/_sha khrag sna
analyzed: bskor/_yang na brgyad kyis bskor/_bshos bu bzhis bskor/_sha khrag sna
translated: Alternatively, surround it with eight, surround it with four ritual cakes, and adorn it with various meats and blood,

original: tshhogs dang /_sman dang /_'bru sna'i chan dang /_dug sna dang /_byang bu
analyzed: tshhogs dang /_sman dang /_'bru sna'i chan dang /_dug sna dang /_byang bu
translated: medicines, a porridge of various grains, various poisons,🔽paper, effigies, cloth, and tiger [skin].

original: dang /_ling kha dang /_dar/_stag gis brgyan no/_/byin brlabs sngags
analyzed: dang /_ling kha dang /_dar/_stag gis brgyan no/_/byin brlabs sngags
translated: The consecration mantra

original: dang 'dra ba la/_bsnyen bsgrub gong du bstan pa bzhin bya'o//_//
analyzed: dang 'dra ba la/_bsnyen bsgrub gong du bstan pa bzhin bya'o//_//
translated: is the same, and the recitation and accomplishment are as taught above.

original: shin tu bsdus pa ni/_thod pa'i nang du gtor ma dmar nag bzhi bcas
analyzed: shin tu bsdus pa ni/_thod pa'i nang du gtor ma dmar nag bzhi bcas
translated: The very concise [version] is to place four red and black torma in a skull-cup,

original: la/_sha khrag gis brgyan dmigs pa dang bcas pas/_dgra phyogs su 'phang
analyzed: la/_sha khrag gis brgyan dmigs pa dang bcas pas/_dgra phyogs su 'phang
translated: adorn it with meat and blood, and with visualization, throw it in the direction of the enemy.

original: ngo /_/de ni zla ba gcig la lan bzhi bya'o/_/bsad par byed na gtor chen
analyzed: ngo /_/de ni zla ba gcig la lan bzhi bya'o/_/bsad par byed na gtor chen
translated: If you wish to kill, perform a great torma ritual and do the above.

original: byas te/_bcas par ma de bya/_sha sa na'i sngags la dgra bo kha kha kha /
analyzed: byas te/_bcas par ma de bya/_sha sa na'i sngags la dgra bo kha kha kha /
translated: Write the name of the enemy in blood with the mantra of Shanaka, “Khakhakha.”

original: brgya rtsha brgyad khrag gis bris/_yang las mgon gyi sngags gsum po la ming
analyzed: brgya rtsha brgyad khrag gis bris/_yang las mgon gyi sngags gsum po la ming
translated: Write the name in the three mantras of Karma Yama, “Khakhakha.”

original: thems bcug la brgya rtsha brgyad byas la/_gtor ma re re'i nang du sngags re
analyzed: thems bcug la brgya rtsha brgyad byas la/_gtor ma re re'i nang du sngags re
translated: Put a mantra in each torma.

original: gzhug_/ngar mi dang 'theb kyu dang /_sha khrag dang /_'bru sna'i chan la/
analyzed: gzhug_/ngar mi dang 'theb kyu dang /_sha khrag dang /_'bru sna'i chan la/
translated: Add mustard seed, a handful of substances, and flesh and blood.

original: yungs dkar long thun rdzas btab la brgya rtsha brgyad re byas na dgra bgegs🔽dgug gzhug byas la/_rdzas sha khrag tu byin gyis brlabs la/_mdun bskyed
analyzed: yungs dkar long thun rdzas btab la brgya rtsha brgyad re byas na dgra bgegs dgug gzhug byas la/_rdzas sha khrag tu byin gyis brlabs la/_mdun bskyed
translated: If you do this one hundred and eight times, the enemy or obstacle🔽will be summoned and absorbed.

original: thugs mgon la sogs pa thams cad kyis gsol bar bsam/_khyad par du kho'i
analyzed: thugs mgon la sogs pa thams cad kyis gsol bar bsam/_khyad par du kho'i
translated: Consecrate the substances as flesh and blood and imagine that all the deities of the front visualization, the Lord of the Charnel Grounds, and so on,🔽are offered.

original: lha srungs rnams gsol bar byas la/_kho rang gi sha khrag rnams 'bul lo/_/de
analyzed: lha srungs rnams gsol bar byas la/_kho rang gi sha khrag rnams 'bul lo/_/de
translated: In particular, imagine that the personal deities of the enemy are offered and that his flesh and blood are offered.

original: nas bzlog pa gtang /_rdzas dang khyad par sbyor ba rnams shes par bya'o/_/
analyzed: nas bzlog pa gtang /_rdzas dang khyad par sbyor ba rnams shes par bya'o/_/
translated: One should understand the substances and the special applications.

original: mgon po'i gtor mdos/_gtor bzlog_/brgya gtor/_bsad pa'i las/
analyzed: mgon po'i gtor mdos/_gtor bzlog_/brgya gtor/_bsad pa'i las/
translated: The bali offering of the protector, the bali offering of averting, the hundred bali offering, and the activity of killing.

original: slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/
analyzed: slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/
translated: Composed by Master Krishna.

original: dpal rga los/_phag mo grub pa la/_gsungs pa 'di ni shin tu gnyan
analyzed: dpal rga los/_phag mo grub pa la/_gsungs pa 'di ni shin tu gnyan
translated: The glorious Gyalwa Chokyang said:

original: pas dam tshhig med pa la mi bstan/_gang rung rung du mi bya'o//_//
analyzed: pas dam tshhig med pa la mi bstan/_gang rung rung du mi bya'o//_//
translated: This is very secret, so do not teach it to those without samaya, and do not do it with just anyone.
